Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka will be up against India in the 1st match of the India in Sri Lanka, 3 ODI Series, 2024 at the R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo on 2nd August 2024 at 02:30 PM IST.
In their last 5 games, India have won 3 games and lost 2. In their last 5 games, Sri Lanka have won 3 games and lost 2.

Both teams last played against each other in the Match 33 of the ICC Cricket World Cup, 2023 where Dilshan Madushanka scored the highest fantasy points for Sri Lanka with 149 match fantasy points while Mohammed Shami topped the fantasy points leaderboard for India with 153 match fantasy points.

The pitch at the R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo is a balanced pitch. The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 218 runs. The pitch at the R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo is a sporting one with decent assistance for both batters and bowlers on offer. The team winning the toss may decide to bat or bowl depending on the ground conditions today.

Temperature will hover around 28.64 °C and humidity is expected to be around 71%. Winds at a speed of 5.53 m/s are expected. Cloud cover expected, so expect some movement to aid the pace bowlers. There is light rain expected which may affect playing conditions.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.
In the 168 matches played between these 2 teams, Bowler of both teams have earned the most fantasy points for their respective teams so far.
